description: PediaSignal Emergency Pediatrics Scoring Weights Configuration

aliem_case_01_anaphylaxis.description: Anaphylaxis case - emphasizes rapid response and correct sequence

aliem_case_05_dka.description: DKA case - emphasizes fluid management and monitoring

aliem_case_08_myocarditis.description: Myocarditis case - emphasizes cardiac monitoring and supportive care

aliem_case_11_pea_vf.description: PEA/VF case - emphasizes rapid intervention and team coordination

orderBonus.description: Bonus for completing all required interventions before any harmful ones

earlyActionBonus.description: Bonus for completing critical interventions within early time window

teamworkBonus.description: Bonus for effective team coordination (future feature)

timeoutPenalty.description: Penalty for exceeding stage time limits

scoringNotes.duplicateInterventions: Only first completion of required interventions counts for points
scoringNotes.helpfulCap: Helpful interventions are capped per stage to prevent gaming
scoringNotes.timeCalculation: Time is calculated from stage start to stage end or current time
scoringNotes.bonusApplication: Bonuses are applied only when all criteria are met
scoringNotes.penaltyApplication: Penalties are applied immediately when conditions are met
